data.text: @TCMIndy It still might be a while before we go back with your outrageous prices and the fact you told me that my special needs child that won’t keep a mask on because of those special needs wasn’t welcome

◾Masks are optional for visitors in all areas of the museum.
◾Staff & volunteers will continue to wear masks indoors.
◾The museum will operate under a reduced occupancy limit of ~75%.
Thank you for your understanding as we have carefully considered all options before updating.
